Name: North Island
Description: Recorded in two parts - from October to November 1984, and between 1986 and 1990. Partially funded by a Bill Toft Memorial grant. 18,000 km travelled.

Name: South Island
Description: Recorded from November 1992 to April 1993. Funded by the NZ Lottery Board Heritage Fund and the Pacific Conservation and Development Trust. 5,000 km travelled.

Name: Other
Description: A mix of overseas place names and some addenda.
